Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your lifestyle or business significantly. Given its unique features and high-quality materials, we believe its true value exceeds $8000. I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $9500. This exclusive offer is designed to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to excellence. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience with our premium product. Let's discuss how we can make this happen. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
